thm hvsubf() {
  |- wf(cmv, cxp(chba, chba), chba)
} = {
  mpbi(wf(cmv, cxp(chba, chba), chba), wral(hs0, chba, wral(hs1, chba, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs1))), chba))))
  rgen2a(hs0, hs1, chba, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs1))), chba))
  sylan2(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wcel(cv(hs1), chba), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs1))), chba), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs1)), chba))
  mpan(wcel(cv(hs1), chba), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs1)), chba), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc))
  neg1cn()
  hvmulcl(cneg(nat1), cv(hs1))
  hvaddcl(cv(hs0), co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs1)))
  fmpt2(hs0, hs1, chba, chba, co(cv(hs0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs1))), chba, cmv)
  df-hvsub(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
}

  oveq1d(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cmul, c0), csm, c1, nat1, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)))

  adantlr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cc))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wne(c0, nat0))

  3eqtr4rd(co(c0, cmv, c0), co(co(nat1, caddc, cneg(nat1)), csm, c0), co(co(nat1, csm, c0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c0)), co(c0, cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c0)), wcel(c0, chba))
  oveq1d(co(nat1, csm, c0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c0), c0, wcel(c0, chba))
  ax-hvmulid(c0)
  mp3an12(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(co(co(nat1, caddc, cneg(nat1)), csm, c0), co(co(nat1, csm, c0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c0))), wcel(nat1, cc), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc))

  anidms(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(co(c0, cmv, c0), co(c0, cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c0))))
  hvsubval(c0, c0)

  1pneg1e0()
  ax-hvmul0(c0)

thm hvaddsub4(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wa(wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c3, chba))), wb(wceq(co(c0, cva, c1), co(c2, cva, c3)), wceq(co(c0, cmv, c2), co(c3, cmv, c1))))

  syldan(wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wcel(c2, chba), wceq(co(co(c0, cva, c1), cmv, co(c2, cva, c1)), co(co(c0, cmv, c2), cva, co(c1, cmv, c1))), wa(wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c1, chba)))
  ancoms(wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wcel(c2, chba), wa(wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c1, chba)))
  anim2i(wcel(c2, chba), wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wcel(c1, chba))
  simpr(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba))

  ancoms(wcel(c1, chba), wa(wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c3, chba)), wceq(co(co(c2, cva, c3), cmv, co(c2, cva, c1)), co(c3, cmv, c1)))
  3eqtrd(co(co(c2, cva, c3), cmv, co(c2, cva, c1)), co(c3, cmv, c1), co(co(c2, cmv, c2), cva, co(c3, cmv, c1)), co(c0v, cva, co(c3, cmv, c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c3, chba)), wcel(c1, chba)))
  syldan(wa(wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c3, chba)), wcel(c1, chba), wceq(co(co(c2, cva, c3), cmv, co(c2, cva, c1)), co(co(c2, cmv, c2), cva, co(c3, cmv, c1))), wa(wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c1, chba)))
  anim1i(wa(wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c3, chba)), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba))

  ad2antrr(wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c3, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wceq(co(c2, cmv, c2), c0v))
  hvsubid(c2)

  syl(wa(wcel(c3, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wceq(co(c0v, cva, co(c3, cmv, c1)), co(c3, cmv, c1)), wcel(co(c3, cmv, c1), chba))
